titleStmt.title: Ding dong, or Sr. Pitifull Parliament, on his death-bed. His pulses felt by Doctor King, and his water cast by Doctor Bishop. His last will, and testament, with his death, buriall, and epitaph. / By Mercurius Melancholicus.
titleStmt.author: Mercurius Melancholicus, fl. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
